Interested in creating your own website to showcase your work? Boom! GitHub Pages. Attend our ‘Getting Started with GitHub Pages’ session on November 19, 2015 in STO 442 to learn all about this great service from GitHub.

Everyone is welcome! But, if you have never used GitHub before, sign up for an account beforehand. Lastly, if you’re interested in setting up a blog - check out Jekyll before the session too.

Hope to see you there!
